title: Voscal
content: Hi! Thomas here, just letting you know this web site is still very much a work in progress! i've still got to add all my projects and demos, after that i'll style the website some more. it should be update with most of my projects around friday 6:40pm! but you can still find a few of my projects on github: github.com/voscal. Thank you for you patience! (8/08/2024)
